verses.verse: <S%H8203>Shephatiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4977>Mattan,<s%> and <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6583>Pashhur,<s%> and <S%H3116>Jucal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8018>Shelemiah,<s%> and <S%H6583>Pashhur<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4441>Malchijah,<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> that <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to all the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> He who <S%H3427>remains<s%> in this <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> by the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and by the <S%H1698>pestilence;<s%> but he who goes <S%H3318>forth<s%> to the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> shall <S%H2421>live,<s%> and his <S%H5315>life<s%> shall be to him for a <S%H7998>prey,<s%> and he shall <S%H2421>live.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> This <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H5414>surely<s%> be <S%H5414>given<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H2428>army<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and he shall take <S%H3920>it.<s%>

Then the <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> "Please let this <S%H376>man<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death;<s%> <S%H3651>because<s%> he <S%H7503>weakens<s%> the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> who <S%H7604>remain<s%> in this <S%H5892>city,<s%> and the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of all the <S%H5971>people,<s%> in <S%H1696>speaking<s%> such <S%H1697>words<s%> to <S%H376>them:<s%> for this man <S%H1875>doesn't<s%> seek the <S%H7965>welfare<s%> of this <S%H5971>people,<s%> but the <S%H7451>hurt.<s%>"
<S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3027>Behold,<s%> he is in your hand; for the <S%H4428>king<s%> is not he who <S%H3201>can<s%> do anything against <S%H1697>you.<s%>

Then <S%H3947>took<s%> they <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> and <S%H7993>cast<s%> him into the <S%H953>dungeon<s%> of <S%H4441>Malchijah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1121>son,<s%> that was in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H4307>guard:<s%> and they let <S%H7971>down<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> with <S%H2256>cords.<s%> In the <S%H953>dungeon<s%> there was no <S%H4325>water,<s%> but <S%H2916>mire;<s%> and <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H2883>sank<s%> in the <S%H2916>mire.<s%>

Now when <S%H5663>Ebedmelech<s%> the <S%H3569>Ethiopian,<s%> <S%H376>a<s%> <S%H5631>eunuch,<s%> who was in the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that they had <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> in the <S%H953>dungeon<s%> (the <S%H4428>king<s%> then <S%H3427>sitting<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>),
<S%H5663>Ebedmelech<s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

My <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> these <S%H582>men<s%> have done <S%H7489>evil<s%> in all that they have <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> whom they have <S%H7993>cast<s%> into the <S%H953>dungeon;<s%> and he is likely to <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H8478>place<s%> where he <S%H6440>is,<s%> because of the <S%H7458>famine;<s%> for there is no more <S%H3899>bread<s%> in the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H5663>Ebedmelech<s%> the <S%H3569>Ethiopian,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3947>Take<s%> from here <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> with <S%H3027>you,<s%> and take <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> out of the <S%H953>dungeon,<s%> before he <S%H4191>dies.<s%>

So <S%H5663>Ebedmelech<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> with <S%H3027>him,<s%> and <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> under the <S%H214>treasury,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> there <S%H5499>rags<s%> and <S%H1094>worn-out<s%> <S%H4418>garments,<s%> and let them <S%H7971>down<s%> by <S%H2256>cords<s%> into the <S%H953>dungeon<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah.<s%>

<S%H5663>Ebedmelech<s%> the <S%H3569>Ethiopian<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> <S%H7760>Put<s%> now these <S%H5499>rags<s%> and <S%H1094>worn-out<s%> <S%H4418>garments<s%> under your <S%H679>armpits<s%> under the <S%H2256>cords.<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> did <S%H6213>so.<s%>

So they drew <S%H4900>up<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> with the <S%H2256>cords,<s%> and took him <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H953>dungeon:<s%> and <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H3427>remained<s%> in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H4307>guard.<s%>

Then <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7971>sent,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> to him into the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3996>entry<s%> that is in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> I will <S%H7592>ask<s%> you <S%H1697>something.<s%> Hide nothing from <S%H3582>me.<s%>

Then <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6667>Zedekiah,<s%> If I <S%H5046>declare<s%> it to <S%H4191>you,<s%> will you not surely put me to <S%H4191>death?<s%> and if I give you <S%H3289>counsel,<s%> you will not listen to <S%H8085>me.<s%>

So <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> <S%H5643>secretly<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> As <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> who <S%H6213>made<s%> us this <S%H5315>soul,<s%> I will not put you to <S%H4191>death,<s%> neither will I <S%H5414>give<s%> you into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of these <S%H582>men<s%> who <S%H1245>seek<s%> your <S%H5315>life.<s%>

Then <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6667>Zedekiah,<s%> Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> If you <S%H3318>will<s%> go <S%H3318>forth<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>'s <S%H8269>princes,<s%> then your <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H2421>live,<s%> and this <S%H5892>city<s%> shall not be <S%H8313>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire;<s%> and you shall <S%H2421>live,<s%> and your <S%H1004>house.<s%>

But if you will not go <S%H3318>forth<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>'s <S%H8269>princes,<s%> then shall this <S%H5892>city<s%> be <S%H5414>given<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> and they shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> it with <S%H784>fire,<s%> and you shall not escape <S%H4422>out<s%> of their <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

<S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> I am <S%H1672>afraid<s%> of the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> who are <S%H5307>fallen<s%> away to the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> lest they <S%H5414>deliver<s%> me into their <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and they mock <S%H5953>me.<s%>

But <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> They shall not <S%H5414>deliver<s%> <S%H8085>you.<s%> Obey, I beg <S%H6963>you,<s%> the voice of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> in that which I <S%H1696>speak<s%> to <S%H3190>you:<s%> so it shall be well with <S%H5315>you,<s%> and your soul shall <S%H2421>live.<s%>
But if you <S%H3986>refuse<s%> to go <S%H3318>forth,<s%> this is the <S%H1697>word<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has shown <S%H7200>me:<s%>

<S%H802>behold,<s%> all the women who are <S%H7604>left<s%> in the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> shall be brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>'s <S%H8269>princes,<s%> and those women shall <S%H559>say,<s%> Your familiar <S%H582>friends<s%> have set you <S%H5496>on,<s%> and have <S%H3201>prevailed<s%> over <S%H7272>you.<s%> Your feet are <S%H2883>sunk<s%> in the <S%H1206>mire,<s%> they have turned <S%H5472>away<s%> <S%H268>back.<s%>

They shall bring <S%H3318>out<s%> all your <S%H802>wives<s%> and your <S%H1121>children<s%> to the <S%H3778>Chaldeans;<s%> and you shall not escape <S%H4422>out<s%> of their <S%H3027>hand,<s%> but shall be <S%H8610>taken<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon:<s%> and you shall cause this <S%H5892>city<s%> to be <S%H8313>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>
Then <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> Let no <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> of these <S%H1697>words,<s%> and you shall not <S%H4191>die.<s%>

But if the <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> that I have <S%H1696>talked<s%> with <S%H935>you,<s%> and they come to <S%H559>you,<s%> and tell <S%H5046>you,<s%> Declare to us now what you have <S%H1696>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king;<s%> <S%H3582>don't<s%> hide it from <S%H4191>us,<s%> and we will not put you to death; also what the <S%H4428>king<s%> said to <S%H1696>you:<s%>

then you shall <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H5307>them,<s%> I presented my <S%H8467>supplication<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> that he would not cause me to <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> to die <S%H4191>there.<s%>

Then <S%H935>came<s%> all the <S%H8269>princes<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> and <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H5046>him;<s%> and he told them according to all these <S%H1697>words<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded.<s%> So they left off <S%H2790>speaking<s%> with <S%H1697>him;<s%> for the matter was not <S%H8085>perceived.<s%>
So <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H3427>stayed<s%> in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H4307>guard<s%> until the <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> was <S%H3920>taken.<s%>
